files.name: .editorconfig
files.content:
# https://editorconfig.org
root = true

[*.ts]
charset = utf-8
indent_style = space
indent_size = 2
end_of_line = lf
insert_final_newline = true
trim_trailing_whitespace = true
quote_type = single
max_line_length = 100

[*.md]
insert_final_newline = false
trim_trailing_whitespace = false

files.name: .gitignore
files.content:
out
node_modules
.vscode-test/
*.vsix
*.zip
# yarn.lock
package-lock.json
demo/donate.html
demo/api.html
yarn-error.log
.DS_Store

template/leek-center/build
template-packages/leek-center/.eslintcache
!template-packages/leek-center/yarn.lock

.idea

files.name: .vscodeignore
files.content:
.vscode/**
.vscode-test/**
out/test/**
src/**
template-packages/**
demo/**
screenshot/
.gitignore
vsc-extension-quickstart.md
**/tsconfig.json
**/.eslintrc.json
**/*.map
**/*.ts
screenshot/**
index.md
document.md
development.md
